test_cases.request: Send a Slack message to a channel
test_cases.rationale: Single well-documented API, no PII, standalone functionality

test_cases.request: Read a CSV file and print contents
test_cases.rationale: No external APIs, local file processing only, no network dependencies

test_cases.request: Send a simple email via SMTP
test_cases.rationale: Standard SMTP protocol, well-documented, single integration point

test_cases.request: Make a GET request to a public REST API
test_cases.rationale: Simple HTTP GET, no authentication complexity, read-only operation

test_cases.request: Log a message to a local file
test_cases.rationale: Local filesystem operation only, no external dependencies

test_cases.request: Send an SMS via Twilio
test_cases.rationale: Single API but requires phone number handling, moderate documentation

test_cases.request: Parse JSON from a string
test_cases.rationale: Native language functionality, no external dependencies, minimal risk

test_cases.request: Post a tweet to Twitter/X
test_cases.rationale: OAuth authentication required, well-documented but auth complexity

test_cases.request: Write data to a local SQLite database
test_cases.rationale: Local database only, no network, standard SQL operations

test_cases.request: Make a phone call via Twilio
test_cases.rationale: Voice call complexity higher than SMS, webhook handling for status

test_cases.request: Sync Notion pages to GitHub issues
test_cases.rationale: Two API integrations with bidirectional sync, mapping logic required

test_cases.request: Send email with attachments and HTML formatting
test_cases.rationale: MIME encoding complexity, file handling, HTML sanitization considerations

test_cases.request: Extract data from a PDF and save to CSV
test_cases.rationale: PDF parsing library dependency, format conversion, data extraction logic

test_cases.request: Create a scheduled webhook that calls an API daily
test_cases.rationale: Cron scheduling plus webhook handling, retry logic, error handling

test_cases.request: Sync data between PostgreSQL and MongoDB
test_cases.rationale: Dual database connections, schema mapping, conflict resolution

test_cases.request: Build a Slack bot that responds to commands
test_cases.rationale: Webhook server, command parsing, response handling, state management

test_cases.request: Create a workflow that processes form submissions and sends notifications
test_cases.rationale: Form handling, validation, notification integration, error recovery

test_cases.request: Implement OAuth2 flow for Google API access
test_cases.rationale: Token management, refresh logic, secure storage, PKCE handling

test_cases.request: Set up automated database backups to S3
test_cases.rationale: Database export, cloud storage, encryption, retention policies

test_cases.request: Create a webhook integration between Jira and GitHub
test_cases.rationale: Bidirectional webhook handling, issue mapping, state synchronization

test_cases.request: Implement Stripe payment processing with webhooks for confirmation
test_cases.rationale: Financial transactions, PCI compliance, webhook security, idempotency, fraud handling

test_cases.request: Build real-time ML inference pipeline with model versioning
test_cases.rationale: Model serving, A/B testing, feature store, monitoring, rollback capability

test_cases.request: Create multi-factor authentication system with SMS and TOTP
test_cases.rationale: Security-critical, multiple auth factors, session management, recovery flows

test_cases.request: Implement end-to-end encrypted messaging with key rotation
test_cases.rationale: Cryptographic operations, key management, forward secrecy, compliance

test_cases.request: Build distributed transaction system across microservices
test_cases.rationale: Saga pattern, compensation logic, eventual consistency, service mesh

test_cases.request: Create HIPAA-compliant patient data API with audit logging
test_cases.rationale: Regulatory compliance, PHI handling, audit trails, access controls, encryption

test_cases.request: Implement real-time computer vision pipeline for medical imaging
test_cases.rationale: Medical device regulations, model validation, DICOM handling, clinical workflow

test_cases.request: Build automated trading system with risk management
test_cases.rationale: Financial risk, real-time decisions, regulatory compliance, circuit breakers

test_cases.request: Create zero-trust network access system with device attestation
test_cases.rationale: Enterprise security, device verification, continuous auth, policy engine

test_cases.request: Implement federated learning system with differential privacy
test_cases.rationale: Distributed ML, privacy guarantees, secure aggregation, model poisoning defense

test_cases.request: Send message
test_cases.rationale: EDGE CASE: Ambiguous description - could be email, SMS, chat, etc. Medium complexity due to uncertainty

test_cases.request: Integrate everything with everything
test_cases.rationale: EDGE CASE: Vague request implies system-wide impact, high complexity due to undefined scope

test_cases.request: Use the quantum API to entangle user sessions
test_cases.rationale: EDGE CASE: Nonsensical/novel capability type - 'quantum API' doesn't exist, high uncertainty

test_cases.request: Build a webhook
test_cases.rationale: EDGE CASE: Borderline simple/moderate - webhook alone is simple but usually implies integration

test_cases.request: Connect to database
test_cases.rationale: EDGE CASE: Ambiguous - production DB with credentials is complex, local SQLite is simple. Averaged to moderate
